author: Staff Reporter
text:
Religion

Bakthi Sorpozhivu Mandram: Villibaratham discourse, Kongu Nadu Arts and Science College, 6.30 p.m.

Thiruvenkatavan Charitable Society: Margazhi Mahotsavam, Sri Venugopalaswamy and Sri Kalyanavenkatesa Perumal Swamy Temple, 5.20 a.m.

Sri Pattatharasiamman Temple: Thiruppavai Chant, Periyanayakkampalayam, 5 a.m.

Sri Varasithti Vinayagar, Sri Varatharajapperumal, Sri Mahalakshmi, Sri Varathaanjineyar Temple: Sri Anumaan Jayanthi, Sri Varathaanjineyar Thirumanjanam, Vadaimalai, Vignesh Nagar, 6 a.m.

ISKCON: Ratha Yatra, Thermutti, 2.30 p.m.

Jeevajothi Family Fellowship: Prayer meeting, Gujarat Samaj, 10.30 a.m.

General

Jeeva Oli Mananiraivu Markkam: Thai Poosa Vizha and Medical Camp, Puliyakulam, 10 a.m.

Dr. N.G.P.Arts and Science College: Yoga Program, college Campus, 10 a.m.; guest lecture, 10 a.m.

Karpagam Academy of Higher Education: Workshop on “SPSS”, MBA Computer lab, 10 a.m.

Kovai Kalaimagal College of Arts and Science: Faculty Development Program, 10 a.m.

Income Tax Employees Federation: Delegates Conference, Rajasthani sangh, R.S.Puram, 10 a.m.

The Coimbatore Productivity Council: Programme on “OHSAS-18001”, Vyshnav Building, Race Course, 9.30 a.m.

Infant Jesus Matriculation Higher Secondary School: Annual day, School Premises, 5 p.m.

Angappa CBSE Senior Secondary School: Sports Meet, T.A.Ramalingam Chettiyar Hr.Sec.School, Alagesan Road, 3 p.m.

Arya Vysya Charitable and Education Foundation: Distribution of Educational Scholarships, Hotel Aloft, 11 a.m.

DR.SNS Rajalakshmi College of Arts and Science: Heftycom’16’ , college premises, 10 a.m.

Karpagam College of Engineering: Workshop, College Premises, 9 a.m.

Tamilnadu Packaged Drinking Water Manufactures Association: Global Water tech expo, CODISSIA trade fair complex, 10 a.m.

5th Pillar Corruption Killer: RTI training, Thiruvenkatasamy Road, 4 p.m.

Ganga Orthopaedic Research and Education Foundation: Update on musculoskeletal radiology, Ganga Hospital, 10 a.m.

Coimbatore Advocates Association: Unveiling of the portrait of late C.R. Subramanian, Justice M.M. Sundaresh, judge, Madras High Court, chief guest, CAA Hall, 3 p.m.
title: Engagements. Coimbatore
